name: Music_2344.wav
caption: This is a synth-pop piece played in the background of a skateboarding video. There is a male vocalist singing in an emotionally distant manner. There is a keyboard and an electric guitar playing the melody with the bass guitar playing a repetitive bass line in the background. The acoustic drums are playing a simple beat. Skateboarding sounds from the video can be heard very clearly. The recording has an urban atmosphere.
